title: Omicron coronavirus cases surge in UK, scientists see bigger wave
content:
1. Omicron coronavirus cases surge in UK, scientists see bigger wave  Reuters UK
  2. London's mayor declares 'major incident' as omicron surges in U.K. capital  NBC News
  3. Sadiq Khan declares 'major incident' over Covid surge in London  Guardian News
  4. Omicron: Sadiq Khan declares major incident in London over ‘huge surge’ of cases  The Independent
  5. England Has Hundreds of Thousands of New Omicron Cases Daily  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
